### Final Project for Data Science Course

This data analysis was created by graduate students at the Mailman School of Public Health, taking the Data Science Course - Nathalie Fadel, Chirag Shahs, Jeanette Shekelle, Jaclyn Verity.

This website was made on R Markdown and is hosted on Github. The source code can be found at: https://github.com/jv2629/police_killings.github.io
